ORIGAM Documentation : Screen Section Widgets

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Oct 02, 2014

These are widgets that can be placed on a screen section. These are typically data input widgets or group boxes.

  • Blob Control
  • Check Box
  • Checklist
  • Color Picker
  • Date Box
  • Drop-down Box
  • Group Box
  • Image Box
  • Radio Button
  • TagInput
  • Textbox
